divs: Sighting DetailsHAD COME FROM AN ERRAND BACK TO MY HOME ON AUGUST 24 2003 . AS I DROVE INTHEDRIVE WAY I SAW WHAT I THOUGHT WAS A KITE . I GOT OUT OF MY WIFES CAR LOOKINGEAST OVER MY NEIGHBORS GARAGE ABOUT 515 PM. WHICH WAS DAYLIGHT STILL IGAVE IT A VERY CALM WAVE. IT WAS HARD TO JUDGEDISTANCE I SAY IT WAS 4FT. IN DIAMETER AND 200FT. INTHE SKY BUT NOW I AMTHINKING IT WAS MUCH LOWER THAN THAT. MAYBE 50FT. I RAN INTO THE GARAGE TOPUT MY KEYS DOWN . I RAN BACK TO THE CAR WATCHINGIT GLIDE VERY SLOW AND LOW OVERMY NEIGHBORS HOUSE . THEN I RAN AGAIN BACK TO THE CAR AND TOOK MORE THINGS OUTOF THE CAR AND INTO THE GARAGE. RAN TO THE SIDEYARD FENCE NEAR THE CAR OPENEDTHE GATE AND FOLLOWEDIT . IT WAS 25FT. FROM ME AND NOTICED EVERY THING WAS VERYVERY QWIUT NO SOUND OF ANYTHING EXCEPT THE WIND .IT WAS LIKE A GHOUST TOWN IN MYNEIGHBORHOOD .I NOTICED AS IT GOT CLOSER TO MY BACK CORNER NEIGHBORS COTTONWOODTREE AND MY 50FT. PINE TREE IT HAD THREE RED TRIANGLES LIKE ARADIATION HAZARDSYMBOL .IT IT HAD CHANGED TO ALL KINDS OF COLORS IN THE METALEXAMPLEWHEN YOU PUT A DROP OF WATER IN OLD CAR OIL THERE IS A RAINBOW OF MIXED COLORS .THATS WHAT THE METAL LOOKED LIKE . IT WAS A DISC WITH A PIE SLICE CUT OUT OF ITAND IT WAS DARK INSIDE THERE . AT THIS POINT IT TURNED COFFEE BLACK AND STARTEDTO WOBBLE VERY BADLY . I NEVER SAW THE TOP OF IT , ALWAYS THE BOTTOM . IT HIDBEHIND THE PINE TREE I FOLLOWED IT TO THE OTHER SIDE OF THE TREE AND IT WAS NOTTHERE .I DID NOT HEAR A SOUND . THEN I LOOKED OVER MY BACK YARD FENCE 100 YARDSAWAY ICOULD SEE IT HOVERING THE NEXT BLOCK OVER MUCH SMALLER THIS TIME . IWAVED AT IT . AT THIS POINT I WAS VERY TIRED . I WENT TO TELL MY BROTHER WHAT ISAW THEN HAD A CIGARETTE AND RESTED. I STILL CANNOT BELIEVE WHAT I SAW IS WHAT ISAW . SEVERAL WEEKS LATER I HAD ADREAM THAT WOKE ME UP AND I COULD NOT SLEEP FORTHREE NIGHTS IN A ROW . REALLY I DONT WANT TO TALK ABOUT IT . BECAUSE IT IS VERY STRANGE WHAT I DID IN MY DREAM.
Summary: 4ft. diameter dull grey disk with a pie slice cut
trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Victorville
There were no other sightings in Victorville on or around August 24th 2003
